ygData.msgSnippet: From my understanding any attack, which exceeds a shields remaining hits of absorption, brings down the shield and does full damage.  Bards on the list were
ygData.messageBody:
From my understanding any attack, which exceeds a shields remaining hits of
absorption, brings down the shield and does full damage. Bards on the list
were claiming the shield from the PGT was far less useful as you increased
in level because every hit brought it down with no damage absorption. That
proc's a 25 point damage absorption shield I believe.

Kitasi
